definition: a showy growth of e.g. feathers or skin on the head of a bird or other animal, to reach a high point
details:
noun
- a showy growth of e.g. feathers or skin on the head of a bird or other animal
- (heraldry) in medieval times, an emblem used to decorate a helmet
- the center of a cambered road
= synonyms: crown
- the top line of a hill, mountain, or wave
- the top or extreme point of something (usually a mountain or hill)
= synonyms: peak, top, crown, tip, summit
verb
- to reach a high point
= example: to reach a high point
- to lie at the top of
= synonyms: cap
